overview: When Max Adonis floats the idea of going to a sex club to his boyfriend Tyler Berg, he’s far from receptive so Max decides that he’ll have to sneak out and go alone. At the club Max meets the tattooed and muscular dominant top Billy Essex who straps him into a sling and shows him just how hard he can fuck him.  After running into Max at the sex club, Drew Dixon drops by Max’s house and airs Max’s dirty laundry to Tyler Berg. When Tyler demands proof of the infidelity, Drew sneaks out to take a picture of Max in the act. When Billy catches Drew seemingly perving out in the shrubs, he confiscates the camera and makes Drew work to get it back.  Max comes home to find his lover Tyler Berg getting pounded out by Billy. Max quickly realizes that instead of a confrontation, this mutual betrayal can be an opportunity to become even closer as a couple. Tyler decides he’ll give his boyfriend just what he’s always wanted by fucking him relentlessly right there in their shared bed.
title: Dirty Deeds
